title: Small Building, W/D In-Unit & Near Transportation - 2 Weeks Free
posting_body: The Boston is located just off Eastlake Ave and is within walking distance to a variety of nearby shops and restaurants including Serafina, Grand Central Bakery and Haymaker.
Terry Pettus Park is a small public park on Lake Union which is easily accessed off Fairview Ave and a great spot to dip your toes in to cool off on a hot summers day.
This cozy basement studio has an efficient kitchen layout which includes a dishwasher and a full size refrigerator.
There is an in-unit washer dryer stack.
We are offering this studio apartment at $1095 per month plus a $50 utility fee
At the time of application we require payment of the $25 application fee per person and a $1000 deposit that is then applied to the refundable security deposit upon approval.
If you would like more information or to schedule a tour, please contact Ryan at
